sp_widget.name: Ratelock Ticket Fields Form

sys_update_version.name: sp_widget_75d31371db71cc10f2551329689619f3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope) {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;
	$scope.form = $scope.data.form;
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>ratelock_ticket_fields_form</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link(scope, element, attrs, controller) {  }]]></link><name>Ratelock Ticket Fields Form</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */
	var record = $sp.getRecord();
	var table = $sp.getParameter('table');
	var sys_id = $sp.getParameter('sys_id');
	
	if (!sys_id && !table || !record)
		return;
	
	data.canRead = record.canRead();
	data.canWrite = record.canWrite();
	data.form = [];
	var form = $sp.getForm(table, sys_id);
	data.f = form;
	var fields = form._fields;
	var _fields = Object.keys(fields);
	for (var field=0;field<_fields.length;field++) {
		var key = _fields[field];
		var value = fields[key];
		
		if (value.choices) {
			data.form.push({
				name: value.name,
				type: 'select',
				value: value.choice,
				choices: value.choices
			});
		}
	}
	
	
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-19 12:43:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>75d31371db71cc10f2551329689619f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>48</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Ratelock Ticket Fields Form</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ratelock" source="x_momo_ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ratelock">605affb71badc01048a242e58d4bcb76</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_75d31371db71cc10f2551329689619f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-19 14:23:22</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<widget id="widget-form" options="{'disableUIActions': true, 'mitHeaderOptions': true, 'hideRelatedLists': true}"></widget>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>
